title: Pinocchio, Part 2
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,265 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 840L
description: In Pinocchio, Part 2, Pinocchio loses all his money to a couple tricksters. Hungry and alone, he meets the Blue Fairy, who feeds him and takes him back home-but not before she makes his nose grow! Instead of a happy reunion with Geppetto, Pinocchio is heartbroken to find his father gone. The book can be used to teach students how to sequence events as well as make, revise, and confirm predictions to better understand a text.
